biotools.summary: Compute the statistical significance of multiple sequence alignments (of either nucleotide or amino acid sequences), much as BLAST’s E-values provide statistical significance for pairwise alignments.

bioschemas.name: StatSigMA
bioschemas.summary: Compute the statistical significance of multiple sequence alignments (of either nucleotide or amino acid sequences), much as BLAST’s E-values provide statistical significance for pairwise alignments.
